content:
advertisement

A new take on a love story comes to Eisenhower Auditorium this Valentines Day PERIOD

The Addams Family musical presented by Center for the Performing Arts is being performed tonight at  p.m PERIOD in the auditorium

This show is a Broadway musical version of the older Addams Family cartoon and old Addams Family movie Laura Sullivan marketing and communications director for CPA said PERIOD

The Addams Family Musical is an interesting take on Valentines Day she said PERIOD Its kind of fitting she added PERIOD

Sullivan said that although it may seem like a strange choice for a Valentines Day show that The Addams Family musical involves many love stories PERIOD

There really is no love like Morticia and Gomez she said PERIOD

Robert Schneider assistant professor of theatre  said the aspect of romance is a really really sweet love story. he said this theme is the heart of the show. it makes it even more relatable Schneider said PERIOD

The show focuses mostly on the Addams family Bryan Welnicki  actor in the performance said PERIOD

For this musical Wednesday is all grown up and falls in love with Welnickis character Lukas he said PERIOD

From the start of the romance craziness ensues he said PERIOD

In this show Lukas comes from a different family that The Addams Family does not get along with causing tensions Welnicki said PERIOD

He said the show has a cast of over  PERIOD

It really is a true ensemble piece he said PERIOD Everyone comes together he added PERIOD

Welnicki said the musical involves comedy from dark sarcastic humor to sillier slapstick PERIOD

The show is hilarious he said PERIOD It is sideexploding funny he added PERIOD

Sullivan said she is most excited about this show coming to Penn State because it allows her to feel nostalgic about the original Addams Family she used to watch PERIOD

For me I love seeing the characters that I remember she said PERIOD

Welnicki said the show allows the adult in everyone to revel in the dark humor but also reminds people of the show they watched as a kid PERIOD

He said it brings out the kid in you and that its family friendly and just downright hilarious PERIOD

Schneider said he loves that Penn State is able to bring so many theatrical performances to campus from many different genres PERIOD

He said that The Addams Family musical is funny enjoyable and that students shouldnt take the easy availability of theater performances for granted PERIOD

Penn State is doing a live theatrical event each week he said PERIOD Not every other place does this he added PERIOD

Tickets for orchestra and grand tier are  for adults  for those  and under and  for Penn State students PERIOD For balcony tickets are  for adults  for those  and younger and  for Penn State students PERIOD

The show lasts about two hours PERIOD
